---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4–1 piercing

**Divine Spells Prepared** DC 17, attack +9
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)

**Hex Cantrips** DC 17
- **1st**
[Stoke the Heart](/Spells.aspx?ID=807)

**Whispering Retreat** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** Kerrdremak is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** Kerrdremak whispers under his breath, and one adjacent enemy must attempt a DC 17 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) as they hear a whispering voice just behind them that claims to know when the target will die; the target is then temporarily immune to Whispering Retreat for 1 hour. Kerrdremak then Strides, and this movement doesn't trigger reactions from frightened creatures. He must end this movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemy

</column>
